incidents.name: RESOLVED: Issues Accepting Payments with PayPal

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented from PayPal side, and we are monitoring the results. Paypal payment provider is back open, but there may still be some issues.
We have identified that the issue is on PayPal side, and have closed the option to checkout using PayPal while they work to resolve it.
Some users may be experiencing issues accepting payments with PayPal Payment providers. We are aware of this issue and investigating.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Issues loading Live Sites and Wix Editor when using TalkTalk ISP

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We're seeing a decreased number of complaints that some users in the UK are experiencing issues when accessing Wix Editor or live sites while using TalkTalk ISP due to a technical issue on TalkTalk's side.

In case you still experience these issues, please contact TalkTalk ISP directly for additional assistance with the issue.

We are aware that some users in the UK are experiencing issues when accessing Wix Editor or live sites while using TalkTalk ISP due to a technical issue on TalkTalk's side.

Please contact TalkTalk ISP directly for additional assistance with the issue.

Please contact TalkTalk to report this issue directly to the ISP.
As a troubleshooting step, you can turn off the HomeSafe setting that may be affecting the access to the site.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: We are experiencing issues with our Customer Support Call Center. Chats are currently closed and longer wait times are expected.

incident_updates.body:
Reports of issues with calls connecting to our Call Center respresentatives started at roughly 12PM US Central time.

Around the same time, issues starting affecting Chats as well.

Our team pushed out a full fix at 2PM US Central time and our Customer Support Call Center resumed full operations.
This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are continuing to work on fixing this issue, thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue.
We are continuing to work on fixing this issue, thank you for your patience while we resolve this issue.

We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Some Live Sites Loading Blank

incident_updates.body:
This incident has been resolved.

Some Wix live sites experienced issues loading or displayed a blank white screen due to a failure in our internal cache layer in one of our regions. 
Unfortunately, Wix's automatic traffic switchover mechanism did not function as expected, leading to a delay in resolution. 
The issue was ultimately resolved by redirecting traffic to an alternate region. 

We have fixed the automatic failover mechanism and enhanced our internal operational runbooks to better address such incidents in the future.
We appreciate your patience as our engineers continue to work on the issue.
Our engineers are currently investigating an issue affecting live sites not loading
